name: Gravity Puzzle Game
description:
Gravity Puzzle Game, is a project I'm working on at the moment. In it, you can move the green cube left and right with the arrow keys. You can also change the direction of the gravity with WASD. Watch out for the spikes and get to the end of the level by reaching the flag.

Currently, there are 11 levels with plans to add many more and new gameplay mechanics.

Update Info

  • Re-made level 10.
  • Added new main menu.
  • Added win screen.
  • Fixed jittery camera follow.
  • Added the ability to keep the camera stationary or follow the player.
  • Changed level select box colour so the contrast isn't as high.
